#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Gotcha Celebrity Secrets-setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Gaby, an amateur celebrity blogger, is desperate to ditch her dead-end job for the exciting world of celebrity gossip. Uncover Hollywood's dirty secrets by tracking celebrities' whereabouts, following leads from anonymous informants, and solving tons of puzzles. You'll reveal the scandalous details on your blog in your quest to become the most famous celebrity blogger in Hollywood! Find 1000 wacky, unique characters and customize your celebrity blog in Gotcha - Celebrity Secrets!
